description.@en: You hurl a twin-tailed comet of righteousness towards a single enemy who aligns themselves with chaos.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, one foe suffers [[/roll 3D10]]+[WB] in Damage. In addition, they are knocked Prone for three Turns.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but the foe also cannot Counterspell, Dodge or Parry for three Turns.

criticalFailure.@en: As you throw the comet of justice towards your foe, you realize within your heart of hearts that it was solely intended for you. You suffer [[/roll 3D10]]+[WB] in Damage and are knocked Prone and cannot Counterspell, Dodge or Parry for three Turns.

system.distance: Any one person you can see
